FOUND IN: Tokugawa Ieyasu (the founder and first shogun of the Tokugawa shogunate, commander during key battles like Sekigahara)
Lambada - Popularized internationally in the late 80s and early 90s, it's known for its sensual and fast-paced movements.
Pace (as in "speed or rate of motion")
Turtle (depending on context, as some species like the leatherback turtle do not have a hard shell but are often included in everyday language)
